page.title: 19SCHOOL LIFE IN WILLESDEN GRN
page.content: I am a 4th year pupil of{St.Mary {Magdalen's R.C.J.M.School.}Very soon, my friends and I will be leaving to start our secondary schools. I will miss this school and the staff very much. As a 4th year,I have more {responsibility}e.g.as a prefect I help to look after the younger children.The school has changed a lot even since I started. We have{two computers}now and lots of calculators too. After school, we have the chance to join many clubs or groups. There are clubs for Drama, Creative Dance, Football, Netball and Short Tennis. There are also groups for recorder and guitar. I like making music and during the year I was involved in a concert,an assembly and a Mass with my class or year group. Many of us are involved in clubs out of school.Most common are the{Cubs, {Brownies and Irish dancing clubs.
